item.title: Codewars: Multiples of 3 or 5 - Clojure
item.description: An easy problem, and like most data stream processing problems a perfect fit for functional programming.There are multiple possible solutions on how to implement the filtering. I chose one that reads closely to the problem instruction. The question whether to reduce or to apply a variadic function is for wiser people to discuss, both produce the same result.
